name: General Chemistry I
description: Course recommended for Science majors as an introduction to the principles of chemistry. Emphasis is on atomic, molecular, and electronic structures, gas laws, stoichiometry, chemical bonding, solutions, and equilibrium. Laboratory required. (A special fee will be assessed.) Natural Science Core Course. Prerequisite: Demonstrated proficiency at the Algebra II level on the placement assessment or MTHM 023 or divisional approval.
